home.name: Sofa

home.usage: Used for sleeping and resting in bedrooms.

home.usage: Used for storing books and decorative items.

home.usage: Used for storing clothing and accessories in bedrooms.

office.usage: Used for comfortable seating during work hours.

office.usage: Used for organizing and storing documents and office supplies.

office.usage: Used for discussions and meetings in office spaces.

office.usage: Provides additional storage and display space in offices.

palace.usage: Used for relaxation and socializing in opulent settings.
